EmailTemplate.name: Webinar - Optimize and Automate your SAP Testing - US/Canada - July 2014.Email -
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Tomorrow: Optimize and Automate Your SAP Testing
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Webinar: Optimize and Automate Your SAP Testing
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
Hear how Vienna Insurance Group, one of the largest insurance companies in Europe, leveraged Tricentis Tosca Testsuite for SAP to optimize time-to-market, quality and cost. Their Head of Test Automation and Management, David Grassmugg, will discuss SAP testing and more.
In this webinar, you will learn how to:
- Manage Time and Budget Constraints in SAP Implementations - Identify and Manage Risk Associated with Change - Manage SAP’s Dynamic Test Data Environment
Tosca Testsuite has an SAP-certified integration that systematically imports data and models from SAP Solution Manager. You can convert these models into test cases, automate them with ease, and then use them to optimize your environment by visualizing, managing and mitigating risk.
Best regards, The Tricentis Webinar Team
<http://innovate.tricentis.com/webinar-optimize-and-automate-your-sap-testing-us.html?utm_medium=email&utm_source=internal>
<http://innovate.tricentis.com/webinar-optimize-and-automate-your-sap-testing-us.html?utm_medium=email&utm_source=internal> Tues. July 22, 2014 10:00 a.m. – 11:00 a.m. PDT 1:00 p.m. – 2:00 p.m. EDT
David Grassmugg Head of Test Automation and Management Vienna Insurance Group
Michael Hentze Vice President Engineering Tricentis
